tasks.label: Check DB URL
tasks.command: cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2/server && node -e 'import("dotenv").then(d => { d.config(); console.log("DATABASE_URL:", process.env.DATABASE_URL ? process.env.DATABASE_URL.substring(0,50)+"..." : "NOT SET"); })'

tasks.label: Start Server PG5
tasks.command: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2/server && node src/server.js 2>&1 | head -25

tasks.label: Start Server PG6
tasks.command: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2/server && timeout 10 node src/server.js 2>&1 || true

tasks.label: Test DB Connect
tasks.command: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2/server && node -e 'import("dotenv").then(d=>{d.config();return import("./src/config/database.js")}).then(m=>m.default()).then(()=>{console.log("ALL DONE");process.exit(0)}).catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1)})'

tasks.label: Server PostgreSQL
tasks.command: lsof -ti:5001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2/server && node src/server.js

tasks.label: Git Push
tasks.command: cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2 && git commit -m 'Migrate from MongoDB to PostgreSQL (Neon)' && git push origin main

tasks.label: Git Push 2
tasks.command: cd /Users/admin/Downloads/personal-dashboard-habit-tracker\ 2 && git add -A && git commit -m 'Fix serverless deploy: inline schema, add forgot password' && git push origin main
